Module gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core
Package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath

Class StaticContext

java.lang.Object
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext
public final class StaticContext extends Object
The implementation of a Metapath static context.

  • Method Details

    • getWellKnownNamespacesMap

      public static Map<String,URI> getWellKnownNamespacesMap()
      Get the mapping of prefix to namespace URI for all well-known namespaces provided by default to the static context.

      These namespaces can be overridden using the StaticContext.Builder.namespace(String, URI) method.

      Returns:
      the mapping of prefix to namespace URI for all well-known namespaces

    • getWellKnownURIToPrefixMap

      public static Map<String,String> getWellKnownURIToPrefixMap()
      Get the mapping of namespace URIs to prefixes for all well-known namespaces provided by default to the static context.
      Returns:
      the mapping of namespace URI to prefix for all well-known namespaces

    • getWellKnownPrefixForUri

      @Nullable public static String getWellKnownPrefixForUri(@NonNull String uri)
      Get the namespace prefix associated with the provided URI, if the URI is well-known.
      Parameters:
      uri - the URI to get the prefix for
      Returns:
      the prefix or null if the provided URI is not well-known

    • instance

      @NonNull public static StaticContext instance()
      Create a new static context instance using default values.
      Returns:
      a new static context instance

    • getBaseUri

      @Nullable public URI getBaseUri()
      Get the static base URI to use in resolving URIs handled by the Metapath processor. This URI, if provided, will be used when a document base URI is not available.
      Returns:
      the base URI or null if not defined

    • lookupNamespaceURIForPrefix

      @Nullable public URI lookupNamespaceURIForPrefix(@NonNull String prefix)
      Get the namespace URI associated with the provided prefix, if any is bound.

      This method uses the namespaces set by the StaticContext.Builder.namespace(String, URI) method, falling back to the well-known namespace bindings when a prefix match is not found.

      The well-known namespace bindings can be retrieved using the getWellKnownNamespacesMap() method.

      Parameters:
      prefix - the namespace prefix
      Returns:
      the namespace URI bound to the prefix, or null if no namespace is bound to the prefix
      See Also:
      • StaticContext.Builder.namespace(String, URI)
      • getWellKnownNamespacesMap()

    • lookupNamespaceForPrefix

      @Nullable public String lookupNamespaceForPrefix(@NonNull String prefix)
      Get the namespace associated with the provided prefix as a string, if any is bound.
      Parameters:
      prefix - the namespace prefix
      Returns:
      the namespace string bound to the prefix, or null if no namespace is bound to the prefix

    • getDefaultModelNamespace

      @Nullable public URI getDefaultModelNamespace()
      Get the default namespace for assembly, field, or flag references that have no namespace prefix.
      Returns:
      the namespace if defined or null otherwise

    • getDefaultFunctionNamespace

      @Nullable public URI getDefaultFunctionNamespace()
      Get the default namespace for function references that have no namespace prefix.
      Returns:
      the namespace if defined or null otherwise

    • getFunctionPrefixResolver

      @NonNull public EQNameUtils.IEQNamePrefixResolver getFunctionPrefixResolver()
      Get a prefix resolver for use with Metapath function names that will attempt to identify the namespace corresponding to a given prefix.

      This will use the following lookup order, advancing to the next when a null value is returned:

      1. Lookup the prefix using lookupNamespaceForPrefix(String)
      2. Return the result of getDefaultFunctionNamespace()
      3. Return XMLConstants.NULL_NS_URI
      Returns:
      the resolver

    • getFlagPrefixResolver

      @NonNull public EQNameUtils.IEQNamePrefixResolver getFlagPrefixResolver()
      Get a prefix resolver for use with Metapath flag node names that will attempt to identify the namespace corresponding to a given prefix.

      This will use the following lookup order, advancing to the next when a null value is returned:

      1. Lookup the prefix using lookupNamespaceForPrefix(String)
      2. Return XMLConstants.NULL_NS_URI
      Returns:
      the resolver

    • getModelPrefixResolver

      @NonNull public EQNameUtils.IEQNamePrefixResolver getModelPrefixResolver()
      Get a prefix resolver for use with Metapath model node names that will attempt to identify the namespace corresponding to a given prefix.

      This will use the following lookup order, advancing to the next when a null value is returned:

      1. Lookup the prefix using lookupNamespaceForPrefix(String)
      2. Return the result of getDefaultModelNamespace()
      3. Return XMLConstants.NULL_NS_URI
      Returns:
      the resolver

    • getVariablePrefixResolver

      @NonNull public EQNameUtils.IEQNamePrefixResolver getVariablePrefixResolver()
      Get a prefix resolver for use with Metapath variable names that will attempt to identify the namespace corresponding to a given prefix.

      This will use the following lookup order, advancing to the next when a null value is returned:

      1. Lookup the prefix using lookupNamespaceForPrefix(String)
      2. Return XMLConstants.NULL_NS_URI
      Returns:
      the resolver

    • buildFrom

      @NonNull public StaticContext.Builder buildFrom()
      Get a new static context builder that is pre-populated with the setting of this static context.
      Returns:
      a new builder

    • isUseWildcardWhenNamespaceNotDefaulted

      public boolean isUseWildcardWhenNamespaceNotDefaulted()
      Indicates if a name match should use a wildcard for the namespace is the namespace does not have a value and the getDefaultModelNamespace() is null.
      Returns:
      true if a wildcard match on the name space should be used or false otherwise

    • builder

      @NonNull public static StaticContext.Builder builder()
      Create a new static context builder that allows for fine-grained adjustments when creating a new static context.
      Returns:
      a new builder
